casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Dane LOCKLEAR, Jr. No. 578A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 12, 2006. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of June 2006 by Defendant to Extend Time to Investigate and Prepare Transcript:

"Motion Allowed. Court reporter shall have up to and including the 27th day of July 2006 to investigate and prepare transcript.

By order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of June 2006."
